para.text: a vector or traverse causes the corresponding data to be given zero weight in a least-squares adjustment (or readjustment) of the containing loop system. Although the traverse itself is adjusted to conform to the remaining data, the system's statistics (UVEs, F-ratios, etc.) and all other vector estimates are the same as if the traverse had been thrown out or disconnected.
